医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
帕金森病的肠道优先理论受到关注询问任何一位神经科医生：帕金森病是一种大脑疾病。帕金森氏症的明显症状——无法控制的颤抖、动作减慢以及脚踩在地上的感觉——都是由于大脑中帮助控制运动的区域神经元的丧失所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Gut-first-theory-of-Parkinsons-disease-gains-traction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Gut-first-theory-of-Parkinsons-disease-gains-traction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e749c2d9-5645-4ce4-9ebc-62ab54c3566d Tue, 22 Aug 2023 21:05:02 -0400 Gut-first theory of Parkinson's disease gains traction
音乐可以在几分钟内触发细胞释放胰岛素糖尿病是一种身体产生胰岛素过少或不产生胰岛素的疾病。因此，糖尿病患者依赖于通过注射或泵从外部供应这种激素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Music-can-trigger-cells-to-release-insulin-within-minutes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Music-can-trigger-cells-to-release-insulin-within-minutes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66b2e337-fe83-4d66-9953-abb0d2849518 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 20:47:51 -0400 Music can trigger cells to release insulin within minutes
马克斯·普朗克佛罗里达州获得美国国立卫生研究院资助，用于研究阿尔茨海默病的神经回路马克斯·普朗克佛罗里达州将能够在新的支持下扩大他们的研究项目，以研究阿尔茨海默氏症背后的神经回路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Max-Planck-Florida-receives-NIH-funding-to-investigate-the-neural- Circuits-underlying-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Max-Planck-Florida-receives-NIH-funding-to-investigate-the-neural- Circuits-underlying-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c99aea3-6453-4065-ab75-551cd13ff70c Tue, 22 Aug 2023 20:39:43 -0400 Max Planck Florida receives NIH funding to investigate the neural circuits underlying Alzheimer's disease
SLC29A3疾病致病机制的新见解在人类中，SLC29A3 基因调节溶酶体的功能，以控制巨噬细胞（吞噬和破坏异物）等细胞中的废物回收。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/New-insights-into-the-pathogenic-mechanisms-of-SLC29A3-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/New-insights-into-the-pathogenic-mechanisms-of-SLC29A3-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76388777-3003-4b20-a4cf-0b06e3e18844 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 20:34:43 -0400 New insights into the pathogenic mechanisms of SLC29A3 disorders
研究表明调节性 T 细胞与焦虑、抑郁和阿尔茨海默病之间存在联系一项研究表明，调节性 T 细胞——身体免疫系统的主力——也可以稳定情绪。叉头框 P3 (Foxp3) 是一种控制调节性 T 细胞 (Treg) 产生的转录因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Study-shows-link- Between-regulatory-T-cells-and-anxiety-depression-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Study-shows-link- Between-regulatory-T-cells-and-anxiety-depression-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2644583f-5be9-4041-838d-96a9e8b7d87c Tue, 22 Aug 2023 20:28:49 -0400 Study shows link between regulatory T cells and anxiety, depression, Alzheimer's disease
学生主导的牙科诊所改善原住民和托雷斯海峡岛民的口腔健康昆士兰大学的一项研究发现，昆士兰农村地区由学生主导的牙科诊所通过提供适合其文化的及时护理，改善了原住民和托雷斯海峡岛民的口腔健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Student-led-dental-clinic-improves-oral-health-of-Aboriginal-and-Torres-Strait-Islander-peoples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Student-led-dental-clinic-improves-oral-health-of-Aboriginal-and-Torres-Strait-Islander-peoples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e6e0f3a-c745-46d0-abbd-2fcf30787839 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 20:13:00 -0400 Student-led dental clinic improves oral health of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples
EHR 嵌入式人工智能工具可以识别有食管癌和胃癌风险的患者在美国和其他西方国家，一种食道癌和胃癌的发病率在过去五年中急剧上升。食管腺癌（EAC）和贲门腺癌（GCA）的死亡率均很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/EHR-embedded-AI-tool-can-identify-患者-at-risk-for-esophageal-and-stomach-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/EHR-embedded-AI-tool-can-identify-患者-at-risk-for-esophageal-and-stomach-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fef5399d-9165-477e-937b-0d365f5ce907 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 20:07:50 -0400 EHR-embedded AI tool can identify patients at risk for esophageal and stomach cancer
德克萨斯心脏研究所获得 114 万美元资助，用于开发治疗心血管疾病的一流药物美国国家心肺血液研究所 (NHLBI) 最近向德克萨斯心脏研究所 (THI) 授予了一项为期两年、价值 114 万美元的资助，用于开发一种新型一流药物，用于治疗心血管疾病 (CVD)，这是一种重要的治疗方法。对当前治疗方案的改进-；特别针对动脉粥样硬化引起的不良事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Texas-Heart-Institute-receives-24114-million-grant-to-develop-first-in-class-drug-to-treat-cardioangio-disease。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Texas-Heart-Institute-receives-24114-million-grant-to-develop-first-in-class-drug-to-treat-cardioangio-disease。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a55aa00a-c6f7-4f45-869d-e465bd95faeb Tue, 22 Aug 2023 20:00:39 -0400 Texas Heart Institute receives $1.14 million grant to develop first-in-class drug to treat cardiovascular disease
研究显示，接触室外冷空气可减轻儿童哮吼症状的严重程度一项科学研究首次表明，接触室外冷空气有利于减轻儿童哮吼症状的严重程度，特别是当症状为中度时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Exposure-to-outdoor-cold-air-reduces-the-severity-of-croup-symptoms-in-children-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Exposure-to-outdoor-cold-air-reduces-the-severity-of-croup-symptoms-in-children-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00a81624-151c-43bc-aa1f-02f014ff205a Tue, 22 Aug 2023 19:56:00 -0400 Exposure to outdoor cold air reduces the severity of croup symptoms in children, study shows
研究报告美国退伍军人中与高温相关的疾病增加研究人员报告称，2002 年至 2019 年间，美国退伍军人事务部 (VA) 医疗机构的患者中，与热相关的疾病在统计学上和临床上均显着增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Study-reports-increase-in-heat-lated-illnesses-among-US-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Study-reports-increase-in-heat-lated-illnesses-among-US-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ace9adae-bab6-4700-b170-7b3a167cb405 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 19:46:14 -0400 Study reports increase in heat-related illnesses among US veterans
